about_the_game:
As part of our celebration of the 10th anniversary of Little Busters! and to commemorate the release of the English Edition, the original "Little Busters!" opening theme's single is now available on Steam!

This theme song DLC is a digital version of the original 2007 single "Little Busters!" (KSLA-0028), and features 6 tracks in both FLAC and MP3 formats.

Track list

1. Little Busters!

2. Haruka Kanata
3. Alicemagic
4. Little Busters! -off vocal-
5. Haruka Kanata -off vocal-
6. Alicemagic -off vocal-

Note: The included booklet is available only in Japanese.
